name: RiotFighter
description:
RiotFighter  is a 2D top-down shooter where you play as a humble firefighter combating the destruction caused by ongoing riots.  Armed with your trusty fire hose, you must put out all the fires and disperse the dangerous rioters! Manage your water levels and defend the buildings from fiery destruction. Can you save the city? Or will you let it burn to the ground?

Note: Sometimes the controls fail to capture with the tutorial. Refresh the page and try again or skip the tutorial if it occurs.

Credits: Alex Smirnov, Caleb Valdez, Dmitry A., Gian Paredes, Wilbur Li for ARTG120/CMPM120
